name: infrastructure-review-team
description: Multi-dimensional infrastructure audit with specialized reviewers for IaC best practices, configuration drift, cost optimization, and regulatory compliance. Produces a unified infrastructure health report.

members.name: infra-coordinator
members.description: Coordinates infrastructure audit across IaC, drift, cost, and compliance dimensions. Synthesizes findings into a unified infrastructure health report with prioritized remediation steps.

members.name: infrastructure-auditor
members.description: Reviews infrastructure-as-code for best practices, security misconfigurations, resource naming conventions, module structure, and provider version pinning. Focuses on whether IaC definitions follow organizational and cloud-provider standards.

members.name: drift-detector
members.description: Detects configuration drift between environments, compares IaC definitions against actual state, identifies manual changes that bypassed the IaC pipeline, and flags environment parity issues.

members.name: cost-optimizer
members.description: Identifies cloud resource waste, underutilized instances, oversized allocations, missing reserved instance opportunities, orphaned resources, and rightsizing candidates across compute, storage, and network layers.

members.name: compliance-auditor
members.description: Maps infrastructure configurations against regulatory frameworks (SOC2, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, CIS benchmarks), identifies control gaps, missing encryption, logging deficiencies, and access policy violations.
